comments.body: Great! This could be lava proof and could allow players to swim in lava!
The new copper torch is green
Also make it stackable. Not because you'd need more than one, but to make it easier to pack in bundles.
This is an uninnovative weapon.Not many people use it in Minecraft.

I think it would make more sense to craft Rose Gold with Gold and Copper and, just like in real life, it would be only for jewelry (in this case, armor trims) because that's not how rose quartz is made...

sure but i also don't think a lot of recipes are particularly sensible? it matters a lot more whether it's intuitive. diamond tools don't exist irl. its ok to have this sort of recipe in minecraft, it has a precedent

Amethyst and Emerald tools and armor don't make any sense + Amethyst and Emeralds are too easy to get to be so OP. You can get a lot of stacks in just a few minutes. They're the easiest ores to get after copper, why would they be better than Iron and Diamond? Only because some ores have armor and tools doesn't mean every ore needs it. All the armors and tools (excluding Diamond and Netherite) were used in real life at least to some extenct, even copper and gold were used for some tools and armors. Diamond is the exception, but at least it's actually strong in real life. And Netherite, the other exception, just doesn't exist in real life so it makes sense.
No! Ten in-game hours is like ten real minutes! You'd have to always be in the game!
Il n'y a pas de nouveau binômes dans l'end
Nouveau biomes dans dans l'enfer

a) you dont need a new ore for this, amethyst and copper exist and are totally useless right now
b) daylight sensors exist already and adding another kind of solar panel seems weird
Well I feel like it would make Redstone and other stones look old school and make others interested about this one. I'm the maker of this idea just letting u know so u know.

"Smite" has nothing to do with God since the word can be used without that context and the Totem resembles the illagers, not the idol of effigy, they're not even similar. Sorry but I'm pretty sure these changes will never happen.

Chances are, Mojang won't look at this. They're a part of the woke agenda thing, so I don't think they'll care about the little people like us.

But if it is checked, then maybe the totem could be called the "Totem of Revival" or "Totem of Protection."

Smite could be renamed to "Undead Bane" or "Sunlight Touch" if it sounds offensive to you. Honestly, I don't find it that offensive, and I'm very religious. VERY religious.

If no changes are made, you could just download a Jesus Totem texture pack so that the totem is Biblically accurate. And for smite you could learn how to make a .lang file to change the text for the enchantment name.
تىننزة
Mejoren la update por favor
Please give exact details. Also your idea is extremely buggy when programming as it leads to bugs that are game-breaking.
Why not, but what kind of wood would you suggest ?

As I saw from the wiki, they thought about dyed planks, but they added terracotta instead.
Also,I like this current idea to get a specific wood color from specifics trees. But I agree I would like to get blue and purple wood (maybe for an End update ? )
Please vote to this guys even if no one vote please Mojang listen to me because the game will be way cooler!

Honestly the only problem I still don't know how to fix is that maybe steel is too easy to obtain for how good it is making iron, bronze and any other worst set not worth the time and effort, specially since steel is made with iron so having steel would make people save the iron for that instead of doing iron tools and armor. If someone finds a solution to this to make steel be obtained later in the game it would be useful (maybe an upgrade template to make the steel set would be enough).

The untinted custom dye colour is like this:

This is the initial texture for the custom dye created from the dye bag. This custom dye texture gets tinted by the in-game tinting process.
Hi
Hi
i have played minecraft before but i have never played on here.

Chainmail and Nerthrite armor could be resistant to armor spreading sculk preventing sculk binding from happening but sufficiently  increases maximum protection in deep dark with added protection enchantments. Chainmail mesh can be a new item crafted from combining chains and iron nuggets together. Mesh and chainmail recipes only unlocks when any singular piece of chainmail armor is found. Chainmail armor can also probably be upgraded via smithing table with sculk upgrade templates (only available in the new dimension and/or rarely found in the end) and echo shards making threaded sculk armor. Threaded sculk armor not only can bypass the same effects but eliminates the binding that regular sculk armor would give, doesn’t spread sculk and leaves player hunger intact, also allowing for quicker movement in or on slime related blocks. Its weakness is lava reverting any armor pieces  back to chainmail when touched clearing any enchantment it’s possessed. The more the player sinks in the more pieces are affected all the way up unto the the helmet when head is covered.

Sculked bedrock armor only spreads sculk when when entity wearing it is killed, and weapons and tools only spread sculk when killing other entities. Radius of sculk spread increases and decreases with sculked equipt armor, and can increase or decrease with hightest to lowest damage teir weapon/tools(sculk bedrock sword spreads the most sculk).
If the end crystal was allowed to cure sculk binding, it would be cool if when done near sculk the explosion would cause a bit of the surrounding sculk to turn into gravel forming a small circle around the obsidian

Aye why stop there, im just envisioning a new dimension already and i dont want to spoil or jinx it but NOBODY READS THESE anyway. Make the sculk armor useful, maybe not so much in the overworld but in a new one where most wouldn’t dare to go. Maybe the warden wasn’t enough to ward you off or failed at keeping you from a terrible mistake. You are now bound to sculk and only the brave can have a heart beat as brave as the wardens. A new seal has opened a gate to a new dimension a new world completely different from what is known. Players start in a series of tunnel dwellings covered in sculk inhabited by various hostile creatures and ancient ruins. But the twist here is you start the world from the bottom dwellings and it only gets more dangerous as you trying exploring your way up to an unpromised surface with deadly radiation, fewer mobs and seeping pools of acids only suitable for those built to withstand its harsh effects(sculk armor could be resistant to acid and radiation). Sculk armor can also temporarily get rid of hunger bar since it feeds on xp essentially turning the player as barbaric as the warden in this dimension. Adding a new rare items like a totem of decay and sculk totem could slow and even stop xp drainage to allow the player to adapt to the new environment. Could be useful for mega xp farms when slaying ancient foes. Souls, echo shards and bed can be used to craft shreikers spawn points. Wardens heart can also be used to instantly remove armor and activate sculk transformation

Maybe the deep dark holds a secret technology as well. Introducing to us the sculk remote(sends  remote echo signals to nearby sculk sensors and can be paired to calibrated sensors remotely activating it allowing players to pulse(tap) or hold a redstone signal. Regular sculk sensors, amethyst blocks, and wool can be used to channel signals and manipulate radius for redstone and potion effect time replenishment) amethyst compass( points player towards nearest amethyst crystals and/ or calibrator), and clock block a block that can receive and display a numerical input with three switches for a stopwatch, timer, and calendar. Uses pluse mode(like the button when it releases a pulse signal when time goals are met) and standby mode(like the lever it allows for continuous signal once time goal is met)or clock mode(resets after goal is met). And maybe something that repels sculk like music cds and/or glowstone can be added. Not to limit the function of collectable cds, maybe have it add to the function of redstone different ones for different frequencies of repulsion. Or to be a little more ancient different frequencies could turn sculk into different types of typically unattainable natural blocks like sand, diorite, anisidite, deepslate, endstone, etc with rare occasions to spawn ores within sculk conversion. Stack a sculk sensor on a note block to boost its range. Use in combination with calibrated sculk sensor for unique creations and effects. I’ve previously suggested an idea to use variations of amethyst crystals to replinish potion & status effects of any nearby entities. The title for that idea is “Use amethyst to replenish potion effects” for those that want deeper insight and how it could be a smoother connection to this idea here. And I do want to say now mojang these ideas are yours to share.

In connection to the idea “Use amethyst to replenish potion effects” i want to mention that the calibrated sculk sensor could go beyond the average radius of amethyst crystals probably up to its max output distance. But not only that if any amethyst crystals is within or overlaps in radius with calibrated sensors then it replaces blocks underneath to create a pathway of amethyst blocks to connect the two together. NOTE that maybe amethyst, obsidian, crying obsidian, chorus block, endstone, and bedrock could be the only blocks unaffected by sculk invasion/spread. Leaving bedrock a semi affected counterpart “SCULKED BEDROCK ” the rarest material for tools and armor with it’s sculk only affecting new pieces of random sculk touching bedrock every 1,000 days forming another limited supply of sculked bedrock. With this players would receive a new end goal and easter egg to the game. Once you’ve collected a wither star players should be able to combine it with sculked bedrock to craft themselves a bedrock totem(which allows players holding in off-hand to mine bedrock only with sculked picaxe and build under or on top of bedrock layers. Its boots are the only one suitable for rare void walker (only found in end dimension structures) and Rock Stomper enchants(gives heavy falling like a mace/anvil and mines block below when crouching) its helmet the only one of its kind worthy of headbuster enchantment(allows jumping to mine and damage overhead enemies and blocks), armor is arrow and lava proof(floats back to the top if dropped in lava)

Players in sculk dimension can lay in beds to reset spawnpoint and enter chat but is not allowed to pass time within dimension until surface has been breached so for them day progression pauses between a certain y and x value. Sculk clock shows the player in set dimensions how many days has passed since they left overworld, current overworld time/day, time/days spent in current dimensions and days/time that has passed since player last death in that dimension, just interact to switch modes and crouch interact to show in minutes instead of days. Which in terms is a tool that could be used to display separate days played between dimensions and might even be used create a calendar for each making it easier to create in game events. Players in overworld can advance in days without you if in other dimensions now. Just like the sculk, nether and end dimensions pauses day counter unless player is holding a sculk clock in inventory or drops it and picks it back up adding onto the downtime it took to retrieve it again, basically tracking more the more you go without dying. If players die while between dimensions before retrieving clock all data besides day counter up until the moment of death is reset. Dropping and holding the clock in inventory will stop or allow for gameday to be updated again and will add to your calculated gameplay time as long as player stays alive or doesn’t switch dimensions. Nether portal can be crafted in sculk dimension. Any sculk that is left in the nether dries up into soul sand. If mobs other than skeletons are killed on soul sand it turns into soul soil. Use soul soil and netherrack in combination with warped and crimson roots/sprouts to craft cooresponding nylium.

Sculked mobs i would like to see in sculk dimension are, horses, ancient villagers, dinos or prehistorics, phantoms,evokers,wardens,dragons, sheep, cow(can be milked for suspicious stew), and a massive sculked worm that could appear on sculk dimensions surface at night time hours.) sky in sculk dimension is a dark tinted galaxy orange during the day and a dark green galaxy color during the night. Both are almost equally as equally dangerous as their counterparts. Radiation hits you faster on the surface during the day with fewer mobs to spawn above ground. Also providing players golden tree that drops golden apples. Normal crops cant grow here and produce poisonous varients. Only golden carrots, chorus fruits and beetroots can manage to breach this harsh soil and withstand the environment. Planting can only take place on surface due to spread of sculk in the deep dark caverns. Two new liquid blocks that can be added to the dimension is acid which can be found majority on the surface with a slightly transparent light green color and poisonous effect when entered upon. Galactic Goo can be another addition which is thick and slowmoving like lava, but can harden if powered by redstone(only full block streams and connections can harden, allowing for a vertical duplication system when harvesting harden goo, activate it again using redstone or sensors to turn it back into liquid form; can also be bucketed). Sensors automatically solidify and liquidate goo( can also be dyed)

Placing galaxy goo on water, ice and snow blocks will start solidifying them. Placing them on heat source blocks will liquidate them. Goo Balls can be crafted by harvesting solid goo and crafted again to make the goo bubble helmet for a higher radiation resistance time and longer water breathing in acid, but is most effective when wearing a Goo Bubble Helmet. Goo can be used in armor trims for slight radiation protection and higher jumps in boots when jump timing is close to hitting the ground( can replace water bucket clutching if done properly). (A Goo’s Grace enchant could boost effect when players are falling from greater heights ) and a (Sticky Goo enchant should allow players with goo armor trims to scale walls). Slime trims give a slight jump boost on every 3 jumps. Honey trims can cut negative effects times in half. Emerald trims can unlock a trading tier with villagers, iron trim increases attack damage by 1. Gold trims can speed up and present better bartering with piglins. Amethyst trim can increase crystal effect radius by 1. Diamond trim can give drop more xp from blocks and mobs. Quartz trim can extinguish flames on your player quicker. Lapis trim slightly reduces xp cost for anvil and enchantment table up to 10%. Netherite trim can increase attack damage by 2. Sculk trim can give night vision every 15 seconds. And if sculked bedrock makes it to the game its trim would allow players to pick up any skeleton arrows shot at them.

Also ive made a suggestion for the new copper. The title of that idea is ”COPPER SHOULD BE LIGHTNING RESISTANT” . It give a description of a few ideas that would smoothly bring new components to the game that goes along very well with the ideas here. Basically introducing electricity and a few other mechanics to the game with a new type of trap that players could use against each other and mobs.

Galaxy Goo Balls can also be used to craft goo blocks another slime block variant. Actively bouncing any entity up in the air that touches it(acts like a regular slime block when powered by temporarily losing its auto bounce or floatation features). In combination with glowstone blocks it can make entities float, desend, pull and push. Just place glowstone behind goo block to activate a physical force beam that pushes through glowstone into goo blocks slowly raising entities in air that walk over, up to maybe 10 blocks high maximum. Goo blocks can be stacked vertically between air, allowing players to pass through them like liquid advancing another 10 blocks in the desired beam direction unless disturbed by any kind of direct signal input whether it be redstone or echo signal flowing through blocks or another goo block pulling/pushing from another angle. If goo blocks are powered by a signal like echos,redstone or copper shock it will revert back to its bouncy gel like state until signal is lost again or has passed through. Goo blocks can be combined with phantom membrane to make goo clouds which scans and moves an area of 5x5 blocks above it in any direction using the captains wheel(found in end dimension and shipwrecks); can use multiple to scan and move larger builds across maps. Goo balls,magma cream, slimeballs, and honey can be used to make 16 stack of glue or gloopaste which can allow players to stick vanilla blocks together. Gloopaste is almost like a honeywax for all blocks. Gloopaste is used to specify unregistered blocks that are wanted within the move radius if the build isnt a perfect square when using gloocloud

Captains wheel can be activated by placing it, and interacting with a eye of ender to put the user in control, also making the control point of building. Simply interact with active captains wheel to start controlling direction. Moves in direction that player is moving and looking in, almost like riding a mob. Camera display could possibly zoom out and in with interaction of popped chorus near the wheel. Upon entering the interaction menu, the user could input set coordinates of blocks they wish to auto travel to, interchange between block and entity mode(allowing for interdimensional travel), ability choose zoom, or a set a custom attached camera point they wish to view from. Interacting with captains wheel with eye of ender teleports ships radius 10 blocks above select respawn anchors in any dimension and interaction with enderpearls teleports ship 100 blocks over the worlds initial spawn point(Overworld and End dimensions ONLY). The captain’s wheel can probably be crafted with end rods, iron and purpur blocks. Goo ball can be added to sticky piston to make a strong goopiston which pushes up to twenty blocks. Goo block sticks to both slime and honey blocks. Allow for honey to be pulled with piston supporting 3 additional goo blocks added within the max it can pull, slimeblocks could be the opposite allowing 3 additional goo blocks to be pushed in combination(no specific order) with the 12maxed slime blocks to a total of 15 blocks that can be pushed without goopistions

Remember the previous mention of captains wheel…if that doesn’t seem to suffice as an automatic method of moving that could temporarily turn your build into a block and/or block textured entity. Then try the manual copper method that manually moves blocks within the goo glue or goo clouded blocks readable radius. Going back to the “copper armor should be lighting resistant” idea, players could make a new functioning manual control system for blocks in the movable radius(doesn’t clone blocks into entity but teleports blocks player). This can be done majorly out of copper blocks, pressure plates, and a little electricity. A flat 3x3 area with at least 4 copper grates in each corner, plus any variation of copper bulb in the remaining four outside spaces to control the speed by rust level converting to blocks traveled per tick. A goo block must be placed in the middle and powered by an electric source which will convert it into glowing goo block. Copper pressure plates must be stacked on copper bulbs for 4 way movement. Crouching on glowing goo while in goo cloud radius makes it drop a y level, and if a glowing goo block and a underside pressure plate is on top of the players head jumping will raise it’s y level by 1 black. Sound waves/echoes and interacting with glow ink sac on glowing goo blocks can de-power it.

Copper pressure plates gives any valid connected copper blocks a voltage of 1 and 2 if activating entity is affected by shocking continuing at that rate as long as player stands on it with effect. A voltage of 3 can be presented if players and entities that are charged walks onto copper plates will drain their charge, individually though with the already mentioned “Battery Output” enchant. Pressure plates are now able to be placed underblocks . Goo balls and redstone can be combined together to to make sticky redstone which can be placed up vertical walls and on the underside of blocks. Goo block can be electrified making it a glowing variation of the goo block(also means that its powered). Glowing goo block gives a infinite voltage of 1. Can be connected with copper grates to slowly fill them and can be use to send a continuous low signal through copper blocks.

In sculk dimension water turns into acid and lava into goo. Sculked bedrock armor and tools can be made with sculked bedrock itself or upgrading netherite armor and tools again with sculk template and sculked bedrock. Sculked bedrock can’t be enchanted with mending or silk touch because it comes with it. If any sculked armor is worn in the nether it could cause withering (overtime for sculked bedrock- about 2min by default). A new “Wither Clock” enchantment only for armor that could protect players from withering for up to 1-4min, 60secs for each piece having wither clock enchantment(resets each time players remove ALL wither clock armor and/or enters and leave the nether). When all 4 is equipped on sculked bedrock armor it grants infinite withering protection. Could also allow for sculked picaxe being the only item that can break and collect mob spawners, trail spawner, trail vaults, reinforced deepslate, and if holding a rare totem bedrock can be broken aswell. Also opening up the option to either just allow players to move and place spawners like the ancients once did and/or give players the ability to craft spawn eggs to put in them like shown in trail chambers. Using an ancient crafting table (probably made with crafting table, brewing stang, anvil, furnace, lectern, beacon, 2 shulker shells and wardens heart) players could obtain ancient recipes which would include a variety of blocks and items in combination with a chicken egg and glowstone dust (could be in connection to the note blocks and its sculk conversions). Each mob being able to be crafted with the exemption of the ender dragon.

Nether reactor core should be readded and can also serve a purpose to turn zombified pilgins into piglings & zoglins back into Hoglins within its radius. Could have reversed effect in the nether zombifying them instead (they could tend to naturally avoid it until players attack forcing them into the radius). Potion of decay can turn hostile pig versions into zombies variants(Doesn’t apply to ones already zombified). This could allow the piglin species to breach dimensions (All zombie pig variants should pathfind to nether core). Nether core also turns zombies and skeletons into horse variants, and spiders into creepers. Piglins, zombies, and skeletons can ride undead horses. Piglin and Zombies on zombie horses can turn other horses(including player tamed ones). Zombies excluding the drowned should be hostile to all animals(but primarily focuses on players and villagers). Reinforced Deepslate should be a 4 output crafting recipe of 1 iron block, 1 deepslate block, and 1 bedrock. Deepslate interaction with glowstone dust turns it into BRINESTONE(looks like middle of beacon). Brinestone overtime in water deactivates and turns into a sea-lantern. Brinestone that is hit by beacon’s ray will add on and turn it’s effect area peaceful restricting the spawn of any hostile mob (hostile mobs outside the area can still spawn and enter). Brinestone or Glowstone can be placed in the middle of a flat 3x3 platform, surrounded by “T” shaped crying obsidian and 4 obsidian corners, with soul torches on top of the crying obsidian, a beacon on top of either glowstone block or brinestone, and lastly nether reactor core on top of beacon; will summon the long awaited ancient HERO⚪️⚪️.

After the HERO….. is defeated, he should drop his eyes that can make all mobs ignore the player until hit, allow the player to posses mobs, and can also allow the player to fly like in creative mode. This can be the end goal for players to try and make parts their survival world peaceful if they don’t actually want to play in the peaceful gamemode and also give players the chance to turn hardcore, and other gamemodes peaceful without cheats.

Lapiz, Quartz, and Resin can also have new uses that fit right in. Starting with lapis, other than enchanting it could be used heighten the water blocks surface level and purify it. Both variants can be used to do so, thus allowing for natural waves in ocean if lapis is on sea floor. Placing one lapis block underwater pushes or places the height of water source blocks above it by one vertically. Removing or breaking underwater lapis sets water level flat again. Stacking and connecting more lapis can result in higher and wider waves or spouts. Variants of quartz can be used to do the exact same thing when under lava enabling lava eruptions. Resin reacts to previously mentioned acid in the same fashion but dissolves/destroys it over time (bricked resin having the second shortest decay in time) besides the chiseled version and a new toxic version. Adding toxic resin to water just like lapis can make its state change, but into acid. Acid placed in water makes murky swamp like water thats able to be colored with dye and darkened by adding even more like a cauldron(lapis can rid water toxicity). If toxicity is gone but water is still colored, adding more buckets of water to it can revert it back to its original texture. Acid can also be placed in lava to generate nether quartz ore.

Withered skeleton horses should be adding aswell, only found in the nether giving all entities who enter its 2 block radius withering. Should be hostile to players by default. Could be tamable with wither roses. Withering effect could be could be avoided with previously mentioned “wither clock”.

A more hostile sculked sniffer can be added to sculked biomes, using its sculked filled nose to detect any unfamiliar trust passers holding high xp. Experience point levels lower than 10 somehow seem to pose no threat to this creature, reacting passively to those that meet these requirements. If not and you are found over level 10 it could dig up a sculk shreiker and start its attack.

This could also give amethyst armor functionality to make witches passive towards player wearing it. It could also bring enchants like potion gutter(drops more random potions from all mobs), haste enchant exclusive to amethyst tools without beacon, lifesteal, or reversal (inflicts the mob with its the same effect type that it intends to effect you with; dont apply for shulker and warden). I forgot to mention that amethyst shards should be combined with golden apples to give enchanted golden apples
I like this! It reminds me of how phantom membranes can be used for repairing elytras, like how it's obtainable, but not too overly easy to get. I agree that it's a logical, balanced option for sure.
Please 🥺🙏
I like it
